pageContext.claim: “The gentleman that came in yesterday, Morrison, he was terrific. He was supposed to be their primary witness. He was terrific. And he said he didn't see anything wrong with it.”
pageContext.analysis: National Security Council official Tim Morrison was never billed as a star witness in the Trump impeachment inquiry. He listened in on the July 25 call between President Trump and the Ukrainian president and in short order informed NSC lawyers about it, he testified, because the call might be seen as "damaging."
